LIFE AND LETTERS TO-DAY, 26, Maiden Lane, London, W.C.2 Tel. TEMple Bar 7697
RENEWAL FORM JULY 1936 Dear Sir/Madam, We note on referring to our books that your subscription to Life and Letters To-Day expired with the June issue. sent to _Mademoiselle Annie Guillemin, 24, Rue Turgot. Paris IX. We feel sure you will wish to continue receiving our quarterly journal and will therefore be much obliged if you would fill in the attached Renewal Form and return to us remittance. Yours faithfully, BRENDIN PUBLISHING COMPANY, LTD.
LIFE AND LETTERS TO-DAY 26, Maiden Lane, London, W.C.2. SUBSCRIPTION RENEWAL Please renew my subscription to LIFE AND LETTERS TO-DAY for a further period of __________ year(s). Name___________________ Inland 10/6 Annually Overseas 12/6 " Address___________________ post free __________________
